content.raw:
I'm getting this error message and a Gazebo crash when I run this branch with `update_messages` in `haptix-comm` and try to access a predefined grasp using the number buttons:

```
[libprotobuf FATAL google/protobuf/message_lite.cc:273] CHECK failed: IsInitialized(): Can't serialize message of type "haptix.comm.msgs.hxCommand" because it is missing required fields: ref_pos_enabled, ref_vel_max_enabled, gain_pos_enabled, gain_vel_enabled
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'google::protobuf::FatalException'
  what():  CHECK failed: IsInitialized(): Can't serialize message of type "haptix.comm.msgs.hxCommand" because it is missing required fields: ref_pos_enabled, ref_vel_max_enabled, gain_pos_enabled, gain_vel_enabled
[Err] [HaptixGUIPlugin.cc:1134] Failed to call gazebo/Grasp service
```

Moving the hand with the haptix-comm examples, such as `hx_controller`, works. Perhaps we need to set ref_pos_enabled, etc. in the predefined grasp code.
